text: Saudi Arabia national under-20 football team () also known as Saudi Arabia Youth team, represents Saudi Arabia in international football competitions in AFC U-19 Championship and FIFA U-20 World Cup, as well as any other under-20 international football tournaments. ==Honours== ;AFC U-19 Championship: * Winners (3): 1986, 1992, 2018 * Runners-up (2): 1985, 2016 ;Arab Cup U-20: * Runners-up
